entry.data:
CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S
NORTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH LATE THIS EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
EAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S
EAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH IN THE EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
SOUTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
SOUTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH IN THE EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 90S
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
HIGHS IN THE MID 90S
